lines.text: Remember Cecile Lockhart?
You mean, star of STAGE, SCREEN, and now SOAP COMMERICAL, that Cecile Lockhart. Oh my God, there she is.
Remember the first time she got laid.

[mimicking her]
Oh, I can't imagine going a month without it!
[Not realizing her kids are listening]
She means pizza, guys.
You self-righteous son of a bitch!
I'm not self-righteous, I'm RIGHT! Kids don't just vanish up in smoke, kids don't just get lost, PEOPLE LOSE THEM!
This is Vincent I can't win with him, he hates me
He doesn't hate you, what's you talking about he loves, have you never seen the way he looks at you, all he wants is for you to forgive him
You were just lying there not scared or anything
I know that's what I remembered, that I wasn't scared, because I knew you'd come and find me
This is a nice imitation of a life you've got here.
Were you drunk?
I was overserved.
Sure Thing, Mrs. Cappadora.
Mrs. Cappadora, good Christ!
Your my brother... I missed you
I let go of your hand I said Sam get lost
So? That's what brothers' do they say things like that
